sentences.english: His muddy slide onto the road.
sentences.chinese: 他在泥濘的路面上滑着走。

sentences.english: There was nothing except shacks and muddy streets.
sentences.chinese: 那時只有低矮的窩棚似的小房子和泥濘的道路。

sentences.english: Our blood-sugar was falling so low that we frequently stumbled as we fought through the sucking mud.
sentences.chinese: 我們的血糖降得很低以致於我們不斷在泥濘中跌倒。

sentences.english: Can one illuminate a black and miry sky ?
sentences.chinese: 誰能照亮一片黑暗而泥濘的天空？

sentences.english: Some ascribe healing powers to the muddy shores and mineral-rich salts.
sentences.chinese: 一些人把這些歸因於泥濘的海岸和高礦物質含量。

sentences.english: However, I kept looking at the floor, noticing that his pants were stained with mud.
sentences.chinese: 而我卻始終盯着地面，看見他的褲管上沾滿泥濘。

sentences.english: Once it rained, water dripped inside and the ground became muddy.
sentences.chinese: 一遇到下雨，屋內就滴滴答答的漏水，地上一片泥濘。

sentences.english: A waggoner was once driving a heavy load on a very muddy road.
sentences.chinese: 一名車伕趕着貨車沿着一條非常泥濘的小路前行。

sentences.english: The children's muddy shoes defiled all the rugs in the hotel。
sentences.chinese: 孩子們泥濘的鞋子把旅館的地毯全弄髒了。

sentences.english: I ended up standing in waist-deep water beside the wheelchair, which was stuck in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 結果我站在齊腰深的水裏，身旁輪椅深陷在泥濘中。

sentences.english: As Troy walked along the path, he noticed it was very muddy, and covered with plants.
sentences.chinese: 託伊走在小路上，看到路上很泥濘，而且滿是花苗。

sentences.english: Five minutes later Ilyin came splashing through the mud to the shanty.
sentences.chinese: 五分鐘後，伊林在泥濘中啪嗒啪嗒地跑回棚子。

sentences.english: A pair of Oxen was drawing a heavily loaded wagon along a miry country road.
sentences.chinese: 有兩隻公牛拉着一輛滿載的貨車走在鄉間泥濘的路上。

sentences.english: The old car was labouring along the muddy road.
sentences.chinese: 那輛舊車在泥濘的路上喫力地朝前開着。

sentences.english: What I saw were the slushy fields which were jade green in September.
sentences.chinese: 我所看到的是九月翠綠色泥濘的田野。

sentences.english: "General Mud" slowed down the movement of the Germans' lightning attack.
sentences.chinese: “泥濘將軍”拖延了德國人閃電式進攻的行動。

definition: to pass over mountains ridges (idiom); fig. hardships of the journey
left to return to unchecked growth/overgrown/grown wild
lit. windswept and battered by rain/to undergo hardship (idiom)
